main event: A sighting of a saucer-shaped object emitting giant sparks over Dodge City, Kansas.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a baseball and appeared to circle over the city., The sighting lasted approximately 5 minutes., The report contains numerous inconsistencies between the original letter and the submitted form., The object was described as having intermittent brightness., The witness speculated it might be an aircraft.
witness description: A civilian who saw the object while driving.
